strDescription: Bacardi Limon Rum is a citric creation by the family-owned international rum emporium. A refreshing infusion of Bacardi white rum and essences of lemon, lime and grapefruit. Thirst quenching, smooth and delightful. Perfect Serve â€“ Bacardi Limon Rum is a perfect match for soft drinks such as cola, ginger ale and lemonade, or served as chilled shooters with a ring of salt on the rim.
